message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a small share, but I want the majority
I'll give you a smaller share, but I want to be closer to the majority
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give up the majority
I'll give you a small consolation prize, but I'm taking the majority
I'll give you a slightly better consolation prize, but I'm not giving up yet
